product_details.name: CREEK Retro Oval Sunglasses for Women & Men | Trendy Metal Sun Glasses Classic Shades | UV400 Protection
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 14.3 x 14.1 x 4.3 cm; 40 g. Item part number: CR271. Country of Origin: Italy. Department: Unisex. Importer: AMIN OVERSEAS , INDIA. Item Weight: 40 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 14.3 x 14.1 x 4.3 Centimeters. Generic Name: Sunglasses. Customer Reviews: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 389 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner is a modern promotional layout divided into four quadrants, creating a balanced and structured look. The top-left section contains a bold heading (`heading`) and a stylized subheading (`subheading`) placed over a soft circular background to emphasize the brand. Adjacent in the top-right quadrant is a high-quality product image (`product_image`) of sunglasses, highlighted by decorative yellow dots to draw attention. The bottom-left quadrant features a feature list (`description`), a prominent price (`price`), and a clear call-to-action button composed of a rectangle (`cta_background`) and button text (`cta`). The bottom-right section is visually grounded with a transparent circular backdrop for contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige (#F9F0DD)
- Soft Tan (#E5D7B9)
- Mustard Gold (#D4B969)
- Charcoal Black (#2D2D2D)
- Highlight White (#FFFFFF)
- Shadow Brown (#776A3E)
- Text Gray (#333333)
product_color: The product image features sunglasses with a luxurious and modern color palette highlighted by metallic gold (#D4AF37) frames that lend a premium, polished look. The lenses are a deep charcoal gray (#2E2E2E), providing contrast and sophistication while remaining neutral. The temple tips are sleek black (#000000), grounding the design and complementing the lenses. The gold frame softly reflects light, enhancing its richness without overpowering the matte finish of the lenses. These colors blend seamlessly in a minimalist design while allowing each tone to stand out individually, ideal for a bold, elegant advertisement banner focused on luxury and style.
